consentDialog.title: Consent Required
consentDialog.description: Some features require your explicit consent to process sensitive data. Please review and accept the required permissions below.
consentDialog.violationsTitle: The following actions require additional consent:

descriptions.voiceDataConsent: Allows processing of your voice recordings for transcription and translation services. Your voice data is processed securely and used only for the features you enable.
descriptions.audioTranscription: Enables automatic transcription of audio messages. Transcripts are generated on secure servers and only stored according to your retention preferences.
descriptions.videoRecording: Allows recording and processing of video calls. Video data is encrypted and only accessible to authorized participants.
descriptions.biometricData: Enables use of biometric authentication (fingerprint, face recognition) for enhanced security.
descriptions.locationSharing: Allows sharing your location with conversation participants. Location data is never stored permanently and only shared when you explicitly choose to.
descriptions.analytics: Helps us improve Meeshy by collecting anonymous usage statistics. No personal data or message content is included.
descriptions.default: This feature requires your consent to process sensitive data in compliance with GDPR regulations.

consentDialog.legalNote: You can revoke these consents at any time in your privacy settings. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.

errors.allRequired: All required consents must be accepted to continue
errors.submitFailed: Failed to save consent preferences. Please try again.
